title: The best, hands down
text: Perfect blend a simple and complex, science and spirit, heaven and earth.  This tool has been a gift of guidance for all my curious needs.  Seemingly limitless Charts, transitions, and indexes with enough help to breakdown what you‚Äôre seeing, this can satisfy a beginner to advanced level astro-phile.

title: Outstanding application
text:
I‚Äôve studied astrology for years and I really love this application!  Very clear and easy to use and just packed with information!  

I love the celestial information that shows exactly what‚Äôs happening in the sky when the astrological aspect is in effect.  I always found it difficult to translate the information in an astrological chart to what‚Äôs actually going on in the sky and it‚Äôs amazing that I can do that now.  I I just discovered that feature today and see the names of the stars but I‚Äôm wondering if the names of the constellations also appear? Perhaps I haven‚Äôt just haven‚Äôt found them yet.  

And it Is really wonderful that this application is free, but I‚Äôm going to make a contribution as it is well worth paying some money for such a great tool.

Thanks!

title: Just Keeps Getting Better
text:
There is so much useful information offered for free that I don‚Äôt even need the add-ons. But, I purchase them anyway just to support the developer.
Just the Personal Events and Summary sections are pure gold for me.
The only additions I would  ask for is to provide more information for the planets on the outside of the wheel such as degrees, and perhaps Nakshatras. Larger glyphs would be nice too. There is so much empty space inside the wheel that is devoted solely to aspect lines that could be better utilized. People familiar with astrology can easily see aspects on their own. Having an option to turn off aspects and add more information on the outside would be awesome. Secondly, providing an Ephemeris add-on showing a whole month at a time would also be incredibly useful and I would gladly pay for that feature.
Love the blog,too! Great job, Denis üëçüèº

title: Disappointed

title: Low contrast font w/tiny type = hard to see
text:
I‚Äôd give Time Nomad a higher score IF I could read it. Because of the low contrast font color and small size type, coupled with a screen that doesn‚Äôt enlarge, makes this Tome Nomad a non-visible app to my 58 year old eyes that use 1.25 magnifying reading glasses. Seems like if your going to use the type and color scheme you‚Äôve chosen you should make the screen enlargable, otherwise you are making Time Nomad useless for anyone without perfect eyesight. Looks like a good program but I can‚Äôt be sure because I just can‚Äôt see it.

To Gary - the developer - the solution to this problem is SIMPLE. Put all fonts in BLACK ink against a WHITE background.  That‚Äôs all you have to do - provide contrast so the letters can be seen.  

Even if the font size is small, IF the developer provides high-contrast letters (i.e., black letters on white background) then older eyes can read your app.  Otherwise, it‚Äôs not much use, if you can‚Äôt see it.

title: Probably my first and only review.
text: I've never felt so inclined to praise an app until I downloaded this one. The easy to read and beautiful format helped me pick up on reading circle charts fast and isn't messy. I can discern the aspects and glance at them and I love having the option to get more accurate details. The add-ons are nice too and I like that I don't need them to use the app but it adds nice 'flavor'. I frequently delete apps when I get bored of them or feel they're useless but this is a mainstay in my phone. My only wish is that this would have a sister app that would further expand and explain different aspects and tidbits and extensive astro information. I've been searching long for an app to pair with this gem but for now, this app is immaculate. Thank you.

title: Super awesome app!!
text: Time Nomad does a lot of the stuff that pc astrology apps do for tens or even hundreds of dollars.  It‚Äôs the very best astrology tool I have been able to find that is not advertised as a professional program for a lot of money.  Powerful, user friendly, steadily being improved upon by the developer.

title: Great Learning And Visual Tool
text: This is by far the best app I could find for what I wanted to do -learn by jumping in headfirst and exploring without consistent paid roadblocks. While I have since bought two add-ons I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs at all necessary to do so to fully enjoy and learn. There‚Äôs tons of options and generally ‚Äúok‚Äù explanations (I use them as a springboard to google so it‚Äôs not really a necessity nor the point of this app). I enjoy the blog (although I believe the RSS subscribe feature is faulty and if it could be fixed I‚Äôd love to be able to sub). Really lovely visuals - it‚Äôs not tacky or distracting:) I tend to use this more than any desktop option as it‚Äôs very clean and easy to separate information out. I really hope the updates keep coming! Right now I wish there was an easy was to see things like Grand Trines and Kites (labeled) as I‚Äôm still learning and it‚Äôs a bit difficult to decide if what I‚Äôm seeing just looks similar or is actually within the reasonable degrees to be considered so but maybe I‚Äôm missing something!

title: Best Astrology app out there!

title: CLASSY APP, CLASSIER DEVELOPER
text:
If you‚Äôve been waiting for the ultimate chart-producing app for mobiles since the launch of iPhone and patiently tinkering with AstroDienst, WAIT NO MORE! Download this app IMMEDIATELY and put powerful chart computation at your fingertips within seconds!

TimeNomad combines essential sets of charts with attractive graphic displays and cutting-edge discoveries, including transit charts, progressed charts, synastry charts, composite charts, planetary hours, aspectarians; tropical and sidereal options, minor bodies such as asteroids, Chiron, KBOs; and illuminating points such as the lunar nodes, vertex, and POF. The add-ons are worth the price and enhancements keep on coming!

And speaking of the cool developments, the developer himself shows his professionalism and passion for the craft and his creation by paying attention to feedback and dialoguing with users if errors are found in beta releases, and with speed and dedication too!

This is a next-gen must-have Western astrology tool for any professional. My favorite functionality is being able to isolate specific aspects for pattern analysis and scroll forwards and backwards thru time. Plus, Denis‚Äô professional demeanor has me sold for life. Thank you!

title: LOOK NO FURTHER--SIX STARS. Amazing app. (Follow-up Review)
text:
Look no further, get this app. If you are a serious astrology student, this is the app you need. 

This is a follow-up to my 1st review that Apple did not let me access. 

My 1st review had 3 stars, this is an upgrade. It isn't that something goes wrong that makes an app; something WILL go wrong--it is the nature of software. It is WHAT HAPPENS when it goes wrong that makes the app, and this developer is top shelf.

------------------------------------
Apple strikes again! 
App Store not able to recognize me while logged in; and hides new reviews miles down in the list. 

I wrote a review, downgraded the star rating after paid part of app broke; and wanted to upgrade it again. If I can ever find that review again I will edit it, Time Nomad deserves a SOLID five stars.
-----------------------------------

This app is epic. Serious, albeit beginning astrology student here. This app is better than many costing $30 and up! It does require an internet connection; but the bonus is that you get very precise coordinates, and the app takes up less space on your phone, and will run a lot faster as the bulk of the work takes place on the server.

It is fast, flawless, feature-packed and comes with a great help system which is activated by clicking on the various elements such as f. example transits. 

The paid progression broke; but--this gal is an old geek, been using computers since the -80's and let me tell you; personal service like this is exceptional, and in 2018, downright unheard of. The developer personally answered my query and spent time troubleshooting my issue via e-mail. Color me IMPRESSED! While the part still isn't functional; the rest of the app still is, and I am 100% convinced it will be taken care of. 

I have therefore scrapped my plans of buying another program, and instead plan on springing for the asteroid package to make it a complete solution. 

I'd give Time Nomad six stars if I could. 

Thank you Denis!! ‚ò∫Ô∏èüëç

title: This App does a Stellar Job

This App is perfect for advanced astrologists. I have left multiple 5 star reviews before and with every update, they continue amazing me and make me look forward to the next. I have Immense Gratitude towards the creators of this app. 

Suggested Feature: Fixed Stars would be an amazing enhancement to the already detailed graphs. 
Interpretations for aspects in Natal, Transit, Synastry, And Composite charts would be an amazing addition to the app as well.

title: No longer the best astrology app for iOS...
text: I made a review and gave this app 5 stars recently. I now give 1 star after the update because some free functionalities, like synastry, have become PAID add-ons. I think the developer doesn‚Äôt have clear what he wants to give for free and what should be paid, changing his mind over time. It doesn‚Äôt make any sense to me to use an app that will no longer have the same basic functionality tomorrow, asking for more money. I bought the rather expensive ‚ÄúGet more planets‚Äù pack for more that 10‚Ç¨ and they are now asking me for more money to use synastry, and maybe tomorrow even the natal chart will be a new paid add-on and so on... think before you buy one of the add-ons, they will ask you for more money tomorrow!

title: Lots of info and controls
text:
This is a really nice app with lots of functionality. There aren't any interfering ads or nonsense interfaces. Everything makes sense and there's lots of information. You can do a bunch of charts as well as look at current transits and there's even a place where you can scrub the motion of the planets with a slider and watch them move in the chart. The developers put a lot of work into this clean, ad free app. It's worth giving it a try.

EDIT: After using this regularly for a few weeks I really like the aspects time line. I use it all the time. I wish I could get a really beefed up desktop version. I‚Äôd happily pay. Thanks for a great app.

title: Excellent astrological tool
text: That an app such as this is offered at no cost is both somewhat a surprise and a joy. Perhaps it is a work in progress yet as it is gives the user much flexibility and reliability, a rather unique work and research environment. It leans more towards research and does not provide much in the area of interpretation of this or that aspect, sign, planet or placement, which I for one very much prefer. It does not replace my astrological tools, but certainly complements them with distinction. I sincerely hope it will remain a work in progress. Thanks to the developer.

title: Love this app!
text: This app is great, it has a ton of information and the design and ease of use is awesome. I‚Äôve been doing astrology for over 30 years, from pencils and books, to computer programs, to apps. Other than no capabilities for progressions, it has everything you need!

title: Beautiful & Useful

Also love how Quintiles and BiQuintiles are included. Great transit timelines and informative aspect explanations. For a free app, it‚Äôs awesome. I would pay money for this app but it‚Äôs free!!

title: Brilliant app
text: Brilliant app with almost limitless amounts of information. After several weeks of use I'm still discovering new things I can do or find in the app.

title: Brilliant
text: I am relatively new to astrology, but this is proving to be a helpful companion in the learning process. So much information delivered in such a clean and organized fashion. I know I'm just scratching the surface, but still extremely helpful in what I know so far. Thank you for such a potent tool.

title: Simply an exceptional tool
text: I'm not a professional astrologer, but nonetheless, this is clearly a well engineered and elegant tool, and is a powerful aid in understanding and advancing my knowledge of astrology.

title: Excellent app, far exceeds others
text: I've been studying astrology for quite some time and have tried many other apps which most were disappointing. But, this app didn't disappoint and has many functions that would take me quite a long time if I had to do it all by hand. I use it about everyday, it saves me a great deal of time from not having to look up and calculate data. I'm thankful that it's a free app and I greatly appreciate the developer putting the time and effort into this app, thank you for sharing it!

title: Love It, Am Still Confused
text: I'm very fascinated by this app and have deeply enjoyed examining the data. I think it's rigorous and complex and therefore... confusing for newcomers. A tutorial feature would be nice, or some resource on interpreting the multitude of information.

title: Amazing App
text: Really has helped me to learn Astrology. It's almost unbelievable that this is free. Donate button needed for sure.

title: Synastry fixed ‚Äì app clock broken
text:
The synastry feature is all wrong. The comparison chart aligns the ascendants. 

UPDATE: The developer promptly corrected the issue. The synastry is apparently perfectly accurate. Works great.

However, the current version apparently messes up the app clock on an iPhone7+. After I edit a person, the app clock retrogrades by three hours exact. I edited two persons, same issue ‚Äì and it is incremental. UTC conversion works. In short, as I use the app, it slowly goes back in time, and reading transit maps is literally a headache. Please fix this. It seriously affects the usability of the app ‚Äì and the app's user. Update: it is the sample Adam and Eve characters that mess up the app clock when you edit them. Persons created "from scratch" don't seem affected by this bug.

title: What about the asteroids?
text: I love the app. It's amazing. How come the Astroids/Chiron isn't included with the charts?

title: Great!
text: Serious amateur here- great app, I use it every day, easy to use- v. Intuitive- and good looking. Looking forward to any new updates :)

title: Best astrology app!
text: I love this app! I can check transit chart and natal chart, and I can get notification about coming transits. I also can check natal aspects, and design also nice! If someone do not know about planets meaning no problem, because they can read it in app! I missing synastry chart, because I only find composite chart, but this app really the best! Love it!

title: Baller
text: Omg thank heavens for this app. Astrologer gangster approved.

title: Really good app
text: Handy for interpretation for the most part. I just wish there was a Elements/Qualities table. Other than that it's really good as a quick reference.

title: Free! And does more than other expensive apps!
text: I keep discovering new features on this app.  It is extremely useful once you get a feel for the design and layout.  I'm loving it!

title: A Great App - For Astrology Pros
text: This app is one of the best I have found after searching through ENDLESS App Store astrology searches.  It lets you essentially perform a transit calculation for all of your own natal planets, lets you compare yourself to others (synnestry), and many other features..!  It even has a way to put the current planet positions up as a widget!  Way good work, you guys!

title: Really Dope
text: This all is all you need and more with the ability to see natal charts hundreds of years into the future and past which is really cool to see. The simplified interface may seem confusing at first but easy to handle. Five Stars!

title: Best astrology app for me
text: I have purchased many astrology apps and his is by far my favorite. I love that everything is up to date, it keeps the natal chart interpretations current. I love this app and would recommend it.

title: Interesting and data rich, but no export?
text:
Time Nomad offers a unique approach to astrological data. A variety of graphical representations provide transit and relational information whether Natal or synastric or composite.
Slider controllers provide interactive input for temporal adjustment and transit or aspect rendering...
However, while it's all interesting, and clearly the design and features are worthy of some praise, the immediately obvious stumbling block is the lack of any way to export ones data...

title: Amazing.

title: Impressive!
text: With the exception of printing, this app is amazing. The interface is CLEAN, no distraction - just a pleasant user experience. Full featured too! I can't believe it's FREE!

title: Magnificent! The app I've been waiting for
text: This app is amazing. Applause to the creator and developers. It's clean and easy to use. I love that I can see both tropical and sidereal charts. This app has everything you need on the go. I love that I can save multiple charts and events. It's so easy to see what's happening in the sky! I love that there are descriptions as well. Very well done. Thank you so much for this app!!!!

title: Magnificent!! Amazing, amazing and amazing!!!
text:
For talking about this amazing app, I need to open my oxford as well as cambridge dictionary to find correct admiring words for that.
Words that i can say about it are listed here:
- gentle 
- sweet
- idealized
- full feature
- sharp
- absolute
- perfect
- reliable
- handy
...
Ok, if i continue writing the words; i can do it for hours. There are three chart for you in this app: Natal Chart, Transits and Sky Now.
With this app, you can look at your future very carefully; and fortunately the app is free of charge, even there is no button for donation!!
Please add a button for donate!
A must have app for any astrologist from beginners to professionals.
Thanks a lot for all you have done.
..
The latest update made it really useful, because you can find transiting chart in notification center. All the best, dear Developer!
..
The only thing that i can say about this app:
No.1

title: For me, a deep dive into learning astro
text:
This obviously is an app well over my head, but for what it gives and for free, wow. A tool that points to those curious, areas to learn, seek out meanings.

I am a first step novice here, on a path of discovery. This is my guide on that path for now.

title: It's about time!
text: Just discovered this app today and after a quick once over I'm delighted to dive right back in again.  I'm impressed with the original layout and function - in my opinion I think it's rather original and caters to the nerd in me.  Not newspaper fluff...finally, something a little new and more creative that will pique your curiosity. Thank you for delivering up some fresh content.  Well done.

title: Amazing heliocentric maps
text:
What a beautiful app.
It has almost everything I need to start studying this dense subject.

I love the uncluttered feel of the charts, and the ease of navigation. But I would love to be able to see the houses on the charts directly when I need to see them.

I'd also love to see hojses on heliocentric maps as those are the most important feature to help me understand astrology in general.

Thank-you so much for putting in as much effort, detail and love into creating this beautiful app. I see you have a real passion for the subject and for beauty.
